content: PFF Panel 2 Seedly PFF 2019 Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 Mar 2019Is there anyway for a retail investor like myself to invest in private equity in SG? or is it only for institutions?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Sandra TeoLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 01 Mar 2019Most PE funds are only available to high net worth individuals and institutional investors due to the illiquidity of the investment, where large amount of capital can be locked up for as long as 10 years. There is one company that provides retail investors access to private equity investments. Azalea Asset Management, a subsidiary of Temasek launched the first listed private equity bonds, Astrea IV. (https://www.azalea.com.sg)0 comments0
